name: ArenaWar
description:
Get ready to experience the real FPS Arena experience. In this game you will be able to face other players with many weapons in a large map.
The game allows you to play free-for-all multiplayer games in an arena equipped with different weapons and pick-ups.
I remember that the game has some bugs since it is currently in Alpha version but new updates will be released shortly to resolve them and to modify and expand the current map, as well as adding new weapons and improving various aspects of the gameplay.
You can report any problem to the email address specified in the support section.
Currently it is only possible to play with mouse and keyboard but we are also working to add support for Gamepads.

What to say? Jump into the fray and challenge your friends. Who will be the best?
